abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Jaguar XF.

headline.print_headline: A New Jaguar Light on Its Feet
headline.main: Video Review: The New XF, a Jaguar Light on Its Feet

snippet: This luxury performance sedan is, on average, 200 pounds lighter than the outgoing model, with a bonded and riveted aluminum platform instead of steel.
lead_paragraph: This luxury performance sedan is, on average, 200 pounds lighter than the outgoing model, with a bonded and riveted aluminum platform instead of steel.
